# Battle of Eperjes

| combatant2        =  Ottoman Empire
| commander1        = General Schulz
| commander2        = Imre Thököly

The Battle of Eperjes (present day Prešov, Slovakia) was fought on 11 August 1685 near the city of Eperjes in the Kingdom of Hungary, between the forces of the Ottoman Empire, and the forces of the Habsburg monarchy as part of the Great Turkish War.
The Habsburg army defeated the invading forces of Imre Thököly.
